name: hnpwa-vanilla
description: HN PWA build with no framework

scripts.bundle-watch: microbundle watch --output public --target browser --format cjs --sourcemap false
scripts.build-prod: rm -rf public; npm run bundle; npm run copy-assets; npm run build-sw; npm run html-minify
scripts.deploy: npm run build-prod; firebase deploy --project hnpwa-vanilla

author: Cristian Bote
